list.description:
Kasumi Meta Gunsight!

It's my first gunsight I have ever created, it took me 3 day's with learning how to make the gunsight and many troublesome mistakes

There is 2 version's, Regular and Small

I hope everyone likes it! if there is any improvement's please suggest it below!

カスミのメタガンサイト！

これは私が初めて作ったガンサイトで、作り方を覚えるのに3日かかりました
レギュラーとスモールの2種類があります

みんな気に入ってくれるといいな！ 何か改善点があれば、以下に提案してほしい！

#anime #kasumimeta #azurlane

Battlefield 2042 sights

Includes 2 sizes for dot.

#battlefield

update: Simple Sight V3.1
- added 0 meter for arc shot
- fixed black pixel in center dot


Simple Sight V3

installation:
1. extract UserSight folder into war thunder directory
2. apply under Option > Ground vehicles battle settings > sight settings > reticle

the one with range indicator is for non-laser rangefinder or low velocity shell

based on: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1101996/en/

Sights for modern vehicles. V.2 (Experimental)

This pack includes some variations not shown in pictures.
Also in README you can find a way how to delete the circles if you dont like them

The horizontal lines next to the centre of your screen move up when you start zeroing. It has no ranges so use these sights only with laser rangefinder.

Also in "Sight settings" add custom Rangefinder because the scaling from different zooms means I cannot place them in a good position. While the ingame custom rangefinder is perfect for that.

#universal #all_tanks #mbt

you can order sights, I'll try to do my best! (free)

Yuuri sight from Girls last tour

you can order sights, I'll try to do my best! (free)

#yuuri #girlslasttour #glt #girls_last_tour #anime

==== Happy new years guys~ ====

Sights for German/Italian 105/120mm guns and some of USSR 125mm guns. Using with (laser) rangefinders is recommended.

Features:
- Reticles for shooting static targets while moving, which can also be used to shoot moving targets while staying still.
- A clean design for less-painful searching and aiming.

Available for Vehicles:

  • Leopard 1s, Leopard 2s, Radkampfwagen 90, OF-40, ... most of Ger&Ita vehicles 105/120mm guns using 4~12X or 8~16X sights (Generic sights named like "...

Sight with AMX-10 M made by Daebom, with 3 size as allways.

All credit to daebom for the original art. Link to his channel since I can't find the video anymore : https://www.youtube.com/@daebom/videos

If you have any request, ask me in the comment.

#anime #daebom

#collimator #sight #me410 #fw190 #ju87 #bf110 #bf109 #ju88 #do335
Changed bomb sight:
Added squares

The accuracy has increased so much that I can hit 50 kg without straining myself. edit 31-12 NEW

edit 12-01 NEW 80 grad

Сhange bomb folders if you downloaded from the general https://live.warthunder.com/post/1119621/en/

!!!!do not use on snow maps!!!

#us #usa #fr #france #ussr #russia #p63 #kingcobra #p39 #airacobra #f7f #tinytim #a36 #apache #b25 #mitchell #b26 #marauder #btd1 #btd #f4f #p36 #p40 #p43 #p59 #p59a #airacomet #p61 #blackwidow #p400 #xp50 #xp55 #xf5u #xf5u1 #pancake #flapjack#rocket #rockets #m8 #plane #collimator #sight #userskin #usersight #tigercat

Update 11-12-25: Added gunsight for the XF5U-1 Flying Flapjack

US PLANE SIGHT DUMP PACK. Includes gunsights for all listed planes, as well as M8 rocket sights for the P-39/P-63 and Tiny Tim sight for the F7F-3. Includes: B-25, B-26, BTD-1, A-36, F4F, F7F, P-36, P-39, P-4...

Radial sights for modern vehicles. (Experimental)

The triangles on each side rotate based on your zeroing. It has no ranges so use these sights only with laser rangefinder.

Also in "Sight settings" add custom Rangefinder because the scaling from different zooms means I cannot place them in a good position. While the ingame custom rangefinder is perfect for that.

Edit-> version 1.1
#universal #all_tanks #mbt

Praying for you 🕯️ O Great Mita 💝

S&W - Holo | sight for all tanks

requested by: @GunnerIsSleepy

#spiceandwolf #holo #anime #all_tanks

#collimator #sight #fw190 #bf109 #Pb2 #Wb.21

Sight for Fw190F8 & Bf109G-6 (edit 29/12 !!!!!)

Sight for Pb2 & Wb.21 ​​missiles:
-Set the range input to 800
-Decide which missile you are shooting (the left one always shoots first)
-Place the enemy in the distance square
-Then aim at the red one and the missile will approximately hit the target

для изменения размера полос крутите цифры в блокноте тут:
// Толщина прицельной сетки
lineSizeMult:r=1.3

might redo this with more details but idk
#anime

Что бы установить прицел в папке UserSights создайте папку all_tanks и поместите туда blk файл готово.

BA - Kuda Izuna sights for all tanks

#bluearchive #blue_archive #izuna #anime #all_tanks

First time making a sight, anyways here it is, Furry Tank Sight for all tanks based on an artwork by Dev_Voxy on Pixiv and X.

original artwork: https://x.com/Dev_Voxy/status/1489055875260039170

Note: Did this as a joke between friends on discord. prolly won't be making one again.

#furry #cute #alltanks #anime
